title: [Gameplay] Veigar VO bug?
body: i was playing final boss veigar today and 4-5 times during the game a VO that sounded like it was in another language played. Im not too sure if this is a bug or a teaser for something that is going to be revealed soon

replies.body:
Hey Kendizzzzle,

Thanks for the report! 

This isn't a teaser for anything - would you happen to have repro steps to get the different audio to play?
It was seemingly random, though I think it happened the most when I went to cast my E.

I took a stab at trying to repro this and I was unable to. :c 

I may suggest a client repair to see if some files may have been jumbled. If you're still seeing (hearing?) this afterwards, please feel free to update me!
Alright, I did as you said and played another game as as fb Veigar. The non-english vo didn't play at all during the game.  Thanks for the help!
